name: illuminated (amueller)
description:
a small puzzle game for the original Gameboy. Enjoy 99 levels of puzzling fun, create your own puzzles and share them with your friends.

Short manual:

  • Main Menu
    • Play
      • play a new game with a starting level of your choosing
    • Enter Code
      • enter a custom level code to play
    • Create
      • create a custom level and share the code with your friends
  • Play
    • press A to toggle an element between black and white
    • Goal is to get everything illuminated aka all elements to white
    • once you toggle an element all adjacent elemens will toggle as well (up/down/left/right)
    • press Start to pause and return to the main menu
    • press Select to reset the level if your stuck
  • Enter Code
    • enter a code (either you created yourself or from your friends)
    • press Select to switch difficulty (length of code)
    • press Start to play the level the entered code/level
  • Create
    • create a custom level for yourself or your friends (share the code)
    • follows the same rules as the game so you won't end up with unsolvable puzzles
    • press Select to switch difficulty (larger playing fields)
    • press Start to return to the main menu

Download and play using your favorite emulator or on real hardware!

Tested on the following emulators:

BGB, Emulicious

Tested on the following hardware (using GB Everdrive):

Gameboy, Gameboy Color, Gameboy Advance, Analogue Pocket
